FAIL_TO_PASS: when set sortOptions then options are sorted within groups
when option with helpGroup then helpGroup wins
when .version(str) then version option in group
when add two options then help contains group with two options
when .helpOption(flags) then help option in group
when add one option then help contains group
when add options with different groups then help contains two groups
when add one option with helpGroup then help contains group
when .helpOption(true) then help option in group
when add two options with helpGroup then help contains group
when set sortOptions then groups are in order added not sorted
